name: Corner Cupboard (Encoignure)
description: Corner Cupboard (Encoignure); Jacques Dubois (French, 1694 - 1763, master 1742); Paris, France; about 1755; Oak painted with vernis Martin; gilt bronze mounts; brèche d'Alep top; 97.2 x 80 x 58.7 cm (38 1/4 x 31 1/2 x 23 1/8 in.); 78.DA.119.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
